---
title: "5.21 Stark model of gullying"
format: html
---

[![](5.21-starkGullying.png)](5.21-starkGullying.nlogo){style="float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:5px;"} This model is an approximate implementation of the model described in

Stark CP. 1994. Cluster growth modeling of plateau erosion. _Journal of Geophysical Research_ **99** 13957-69.

which combines invasion percolation, diffusion-limited aggregation and Eden growth to simulated gullying erosion at a plateau edge.
